title: Emerging Markets
abstractText:
Emerging Markets Group (EMG) has been awarded an ESRC grant to continue running a series of workshops, whereby academic researchers present and discuss their research to an audience of academics, policymakers and members of the business community. The workshops aim to improve our understanding of the functioning of foreign exchange and financial markets, of financial and economic distress, of the implications of financial deregulation, of the links between financial development and economic growth, of the microstructure issues relating to capital markets and of the rules and formal laws with respect to corporate governance.

The EMG/ESRC workshops are a focal point for exchanging information and networking. They facilitate co-operation amongst academics and among the academic community and practitioners, and it is hoped to encourage joint projects. 

If you would like to participate contact the Director of EMG, Professor Kate Phylaktis at K.Phylaktis@city.ac.uk.

For more details on the workshops visit EMG website http://www.cass.city.ac.uk/emg/.
